content: Investments SAXO Capital Markets Asked by AnonymousAsked on 09 Jun 2019I’m trying to withdraw money from my Saxo Investor account, it requires Local Clearing Code, Account Number & SWIFT BIC, is this a telegraphic transfer? If so will DBS or OCBC charge me fees?I’m trying to withdraw money from my Saxo Investor account but I'm unable to, anyone knows why?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Jacky YapLevel 4. ProdigyUpdated on 11 Jun 2019Hi there - im using saxo too. I believe it is a TT if your registered account is in USD. If it is a Singapore account it might be a giro transfer. Best is to just call the hotline. :)I remembered withdrawing from my USD account too and was charged a small fee.2 comments0
Question Poster10 Jun 2019Hi, thanks for the reply. If i were to convert to SGD before I withdraw would there be a fee?James Yeo11 Jun 2019I  think will have FX conversion charges
